channel.title: Searching for some team members!
channel.description:
Hello Everyone !,
I'm searching for some team members who can host and develop a bit !
I dont know for sure what source i will use but i will try to make a really nice server WITH Really nice Team members/partners
PM me if you are interested !
Loek

item.dc:creator: @mursanari mursanari

Lol probs, James you working on any projects atm?

item.title: Searching for some team members!
item.dc:creator: @mursanari mursanari
item.description:
@mursanari wrote:

[quote=“Scape-JAVA, post:3, topic:379825”][quote author=Project Realm link=topic=475667.msg3478634#msg3478634 date=1295909835]
Try to neaten up the page a bit, and add some more content, like server goals and media (if available). If it doesn’t appeal to the reader, why the hell would anyone apply to help you out? Just a thought.
[/quote]

What he said.

I can guarantee you will not get many applicants with a thread like this. It would be advised that you add more information/media to the topic or this will go no where and it will get locked.[/quote]

And i thought it was also against the rules to request a hoster :\

Read full topic

Project Realm:

Try to neaten up the page a bit, and add some more content, like server goals and media (if available). If it doesn’t appeal to the reader, why the hell would anyone apply to help you out? Just a thought.

What he said.

I can guarantee you will not get many applicants with a thread like this. It would be advised that you add more information/media to the topic or this will go no where and it will get locked.
